# Guid.AsStringSeperatedByHyphensEnclosedInBraces method

32 digits separated by hyphens enclosed in braces.

```csharp
public static string AsStringSeperatedByHyphensEnclosedInBraces()
```

## Return Value

32 digits separated by hyphens enclosed in braces. ex: {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} .
